title: Catalogue, "Ex Libris 17 (Nude Figure Cover)", 1990
medium: Lithography in red and black ink on white wove paper
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The cover shows a nude female figure reading a book printed in red. Printed diagonally over the cover and image of the female nude are the names of artists. Ont he back cover is the gallery name with the address and phone number. Inside are text and images for 46 items relating to the gallery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Catalogue, "Ex Libris 17 (Nude Figure Cover)", 1990.
1990. Lithography in red and black ink on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-152.
